title: Why did everyone suddenly become an ADC main?
body: topic title, last season its like they were nowhere to be found, this season its like every other person is now an adc main xD

replies.body:
Previously, ADCs really could not do the insane damage to tanks that the current armor shred ADC builds deal. (Lucian, Miss Fortune, etc.) The most common items that offered armor pen that was picked up were the Last Whisper's upgraded variants and Youmuu's Ghostblade. Now it's all gone to shit because of how gold efficient the BC is currently and how some champs can abuse it (Lucian, Mf, Twitch *not that common*).
~ruski
